https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/a7AwYQPnKughqkZ8Rxrkq3eewuq.jpg Hiroshi, a 30 year-old businessman, has traveled back in time 20 years. He encounters Kazumi, a young woman who was gravely ill. Hiroshi regarded this as an opportunity to help the young woman from his past, the memory of whom he had always cherished. A Heartful of Love
